name: sterility

sterility noun [U]
(UNABLE TO PRODUCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in animals and people) the condition of being unable to produce young, or (in plants) the condition of being unable to produce plants or crops
the state of having no imagination, new ideas, or energy: They complained about the emotional sterility of their marriages.
